publication.abstract: Don't look sharp, look fuzzy. A technique for "fuzzy" pharmacophore screening is presented. Two prospective applications with RNA targets were performed: virtual screening for inhibitors of the Tat-TAR RNA interaction and in vitro protein expression. The hits contain alternative scaffolds and were found through a fuzzy pharmacophore model (see figure) of ligand binding poses. (Figure Presented) Â© 2007 Wiley-VCH Verlag GmbH & Co. KGaA.
publication.title: Scaffold hopping by "fuzzy" pharmacophores and its application to RNA targets

summary.description: Pymol Plugin for Fuzzy Pharmacophore Models
summary.name: LIQUID
